vote.title: To honor the life and legacy of Robert “Bob” Nunnally and to extend our sincerest condolences to his family and friends.
vote.description:
Title
 
To honor the life and legacy of Robert “Bob” Nunnally and to extend our sincerest condolences to his family and friends. 
 
Body
 
WHEREAS, Bob served as a trusted and respected NBC4 meteorologist for over 20 years, initially joining as a weathercaster about 28 years ago; and
 
WHEREAS, Bob was well-known for his charismatic and endearing nature, his professionalism and dedication to central Ohioans, and his gentle sense of humor; and
 
WHEREAS, Bob’s legacy extends beyond his work as a meteorologist, as he supported charitable organizations such as the American Heart Association and the Cancer Society, and even helped abandoned pets find families through his “Find A Friend" segment; and
 
WHEREAS, the community, his colleagues, and all those who knew Bob mourn his loss, but also celebrate the profound impact he made during his lifetime; now, therefore; 
 
BE IT RESOLVED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF COLUMBUS:
 
That we do hereby share our deepest condolences with the Nunnally family and honor, recognize, and celebrate the life of Robert “Bob” Nunnally.
